main event: The witness observed an object that appeared similar to a satellite, flashing and moving rapidly and steadily, for approximately 5-7 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed to be flashing and moving rapidly and steadily, with no irregular motion.
The witness had a previous sighting of a similar object on June 6, 1976 at 5:10 PM in Greenville, Ohio.
The witness provided detailed information about the sighting, including the date, time, location, weather conditions, and their personal details.
The witness reported the sighting to an unspecified person or organization at an unspecified time.
The object was described as being similar in shape and motion to a satellite, leading to the conclusion that it was likely a satellite.
sighted object: a flashing, rapidly moving object similar in appearance to a satellite
